name: extrachill-users
description: User management system for ExtraChill Platform

scripts.build: npm run build:blocks && npm run copy:block-files
scripts.build:blocks: npm run build:login-register && npm run build:password-reset && npm run build:onboarding
scripts.copy:block-files: cp blocks/login-register/block.json blocks/login-register/render.php blocks/login-register/style.css blocks/login-register/view.js build/login-register/ && cp blocks/password-reset/block.json blocks/password-reset/render.php blocks/password-reset/style.css blocks/password-reset/view.js build/password-reset/ && cp blocks/onboarding/block.json blocks/onboarding/render.php blocks/onboarding/style.css blocks/onboarding/view.js build/onboarding/
